CustomField.formula: IF( HS_Generated_by_Sales__c = "True" || ( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Outreach") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "ZoomInfo") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Webinar") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Sales Generated") ) || ( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "TSE" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "AE-I" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "AE-II" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "AE-III" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "BDR" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "CSAM" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "EAM" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "CSS" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "EBDR" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "EGR" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "IMS" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "SAE" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "SAM" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "SDR" || CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "VMS" ) || ( Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "TSE" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "AE-I" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "AE-II" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "AE-III" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "BDR" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "CSAM" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "EAM" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "CSS" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "EBDR" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "EGR" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "IMS" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "SAE" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "SAM" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "SDR" || Ultimate_Created_By_Role__c = "VMS" ), "TRUE","FALSE" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula that looks at HS info, Lead Source, Created By and Ultimate Created By to determine if this was generated by Sales
CustomField.label: Generated by Sales
